hotel_name: 굿모닝 캄폿 게스트하우스 (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: 무난함”
content: Too bad

hotel_name: 굿모닝 캄폿 게스트하우스 (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Good location but needing lots of updates”
content: Decent place for what you pay, definitely in need of some repairs, our room was quite moldy but it is in a perfect location and the staff were helpful and friendly

hotel_name: 굿모닝 캄폿 게스트하우스 (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Great Location for the price point”
content:
Right in front of the river and a stroll to the pubs and restaurants.
The room I stayed in for two nights can do with more through cleaning.
There is a night guard on duty if you stumbled back late.

hotel_name: 굿모닝 캄폿 게스트하우스 (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: 무난함”
content: Dirty walls, and broken shower, with low pressure.

hotel_name: 굿모닝 캄폿 게스트하우스 (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Gone downhill”
content:
The property itself needs a proper renovation, serious mold and leaks in the rooms (I stayed in the riverside and their priciest room). Water pooled in the room from rain, very bad mold in room and shower, hardly any water pressure in shower.


Something they can't be blamed for,but also don't warn you about, is there is terribly loud music along the riverside (wasn't there previously) that blares until midnight each night.

hotel_name: 굿모닝 캄폿 게스트하우스 (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Budget ”
content: Place could do with a paint job.but apart from that,staff was great and tuk tuk driver  was excellent.food was plentiful and nice.overall for money great stay.and close to everything

hotel_name: 굿모닝 캄폿 게스트하우스 (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Good location”
content: Old style

hotel_name: 굿모닝 캄폿 게스트하우스 (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Location”
content: It's a we'll run guest house or small hotel with very comfortable beds to recommend it but it's greatest asset - apart from the helpful staff and tasty meals - is it's great location by the river and amid those cafes and restaurants still running.

hotel_name: 굿모닝 캄폿 게스트하우스 (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Very cheap room ”
content:
The bed was fairly good in defense of my review however I selected a room without A/C as I had done in other places but the room was actually hotter than outside somehow. 

The toilet didn't seem to get rid of whatever you flushed and the water was constantly yellow. 

The staff were extremely friendly to be fair so if you got a better room it may well be a much better experience.

hotel_name: 굿모닝 캄폿 게스트하우스 (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: 양호”
content: Great location and staff but understand it is a cheap room .was great for a 4 day stay.

hotel_name: 굿모닝 캄폿 게스트하우스 (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Great location”

hotel_name: 굿모닝 캄폿 게스트하우스 (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Great stay!”
content:
A large and clean room
Silent
well located
Great value for the price!

hotel_name: 굿모닝 캄폿 게스트하우스 (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Great new and comfortable- right in the heart of Kampot”
content:
On the river, great view- in the middle of Kampot town centre, this place is not to be missed. Really comfortable bed- and fantastic value for money.

STAY HERE!

hotel_name: 굿모닝 캄폿 게스트하우스 (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Great location”
content: Well known and always busy guesthouse.  $15 air conditioned rooms with comfortable beds and a great location.

hotel_name: 굿모닝 캄폿 게스트하우스 (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: good value”
content: Nice clean place, and good value compared to a lot of nearby places.  No TV, in case that's an issue for you.

hotel_name: 굿모닝 캄폿 게스트하우스 (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Made my vacation better”
content:
The staff is so friendly and helpful. My gf kept some things in the main fridge, which the staff was more than willing to assist in. For the price, the room is great. It was clean. The location is perfect!!!

I extended my stay!  If I go to kampot again, I will absolutely book again!

hotel_name: 굿모닝 캄폿 게스트하우스 (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Good value for money”
content:
Good location
Hot showers 
Comfy beds
Good food at restaurant 
Can hire scooters

hotel_name: 굿모닝 캄폿 게스트하우스 (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Wonderful guest house on the river side.”
content:
Beautiful place here. The Staff all seem very honest and friendly. The rooms are big clean and the Air con works great. There is a laid back bar upstairs with a pool table and social atmosphere. Restrant does good breakfast. There is also a food place either side and an rustic boat bar oppsite and a sunset dinner boat tour next to that.
It is Walking distance from the high street. Its a great place.  Each evening you can watch the sunset from the roof top bar or the 2nd floor smoking area balcony.
Both over look the large river with mountains in the background.
AKA very nice view.
I booked a tour to the top of the mountain with reception and there was a free pick up.
I recomend

hotel_name: 굿모닝 캄폿 게스트하우스 (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Great Location Great Value”
content:
Other than having to leave my shoes outside I really enjoyed my room. Good aircon, no window (which was great for day sleeping and no noise)

WIFI speed test says 20 meg download?!
Lovely staff

hotel_name: 굿모닝 캄폿 게스트하우스 (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: I wish I could have stayed longer”
content: Big clean room with comfortable bed, great view, and AC that really worked. Food was great and rooftop lounge was accessible all day (even when bar wasn't open) and a great place to enjoy my coffee and read and watch the city in the morning.

hotel_name: 굿모닝 캄폿 게스트하우스 (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Location Location Location”
content: The rooms are good size and clean, nice hot water in the shower, you can hear so e music until 9 or 10 pm.  Best coffee served in a mug!  I've only had breakfast, good variety, great fruit, yogourt & muslin.   Wi-fi works well in central and front rooms but that's with my Ipad which is sometimes picky.

hotel_name: 굿모닝 캄폿 게스트하우스 (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Good Location”
content:
Good Morning is nearly river, at everning so good
We stayed 1 night, 3 rooms but same price, not same facilities. 1 room has no window.

hotel_name: 굿모닝 캄폿 게스트하우스 (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Great value”
content: This is a really nice hotel, comfy beds, nice staff and perfect location. The rooms are spacious and clean. The breakfast in the hotel restaurant is really good and the prices are good as well.

hotel_name: 굿모닝 캄폿 게스트하우스 (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Lovely place to stay”
content: The hotel is lovely and the rooms are spacious. I believe this is a new hotel as there doesn't seem to be much atmosphere on the rooftop terrace at the moment, just washing and a few stools. I believe this will be an up & coming place to stay and will compete with many other hotels. A nice place to stay if you are not wanting to stay in a hostel.

hotel_name: 굿모닝 캄폿 게스트하우스 (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Overall good ”
content: Sheets are clean but have marks of cigarettes burning. Airconditioning worked well. No tv in the room. The only downside is when you book through Agoda they tend to put you on 3rd floor which is a hassle 😭 to climb.

hotel_name: 굿모닝 캄폿 게스트하우스 (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: A nice place and affordable”
content: I came here around 5 years ago and revisited recently. Helpful staff and very friendly.

hotel_name: 굿모닝 캄폿 게스트하우스 (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: The best location”
content: The best for both trip at the river to see sunset and natural nightlight.

hotel_name: 굿모닝 캄폿 게스트하우스 (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Fabulous Guesthouse in Excellent Location”
content:
Fabulous Guesthouse in Excellent Location....
Friendly staff & rooms well kept...
Value for money...
Conveniently located close to the main strip...
A+++

hotel_name: 굿모닝 캄폿 게스트하우스 (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Solid, Large and Clean”
content:
We've stayed in a lot of dodgy hotels for cheap, but this one was all round great.
We had the city view on the top floor (no elevator), which also had a partial view of the river.
The room was huge and had two opening windows. A big plus for those disliking airconditioning.

Perfect location too.
We were really satisfied with the price and quality of this room.

Although there aren't many mosquitos three floors up, fly screens would be my only suggestion.

hotel_name: 굿모닝 캄폿 게스트하우스 (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Excellent location!”
content: Lovely across from The Riverfront Guesthouse. Very clean tile floors everywhere. Close to all about the Town and the River activities. Highly recommend. - only one thing: the Guesthouse staff booked a Phnom Penh International Airport Shuttle Bus Ticket For Me. Said 3 hours ride. However, the fact was “a local bus” to stopped by so often everywhere to pick up local people and finally took almost 5 hrs. This is not supposed to happen to “The Tourists Shuttle Bus”, I think. Thanks!

hotel_name: 굿모닝 캄폿 게스트하우스 (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Right across the river!  ”
content: Staff was great!  Location was perfect!

hotel_name: 굿모닝 캄폿 게스트하우스 (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Fantastic staff & decent food!”
content: Ideal no frills guesthouse on the riverfront bang in the city center with wonderful friendly staff members and a great rooftop bar.

hotel_name: 굿모닝 캄폿 게스트하우스 (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: 무난함”
content: Dirty walls, and broken shower, with low pressure.

hotel_name: 굿모닝 캄폿 게스트하우스 (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: I booked 3 room with 1 bed each room, when I arrive there they said they reserved for me only 2 room”
content: I booked 3 room with 1 bed each room, when I arrive there they said they reserved for me only 2 rooms (1room1bed & 1room 2beds) but they charged me for 3 rooms. First and last time.

hotel_name: 굿모닝 캄폿 게스트하우스 (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: 무난함”
content: This hotel is very overpriced. It is basic in the extreme with just a bed in the room. But the staff are friendly and the location is excellent

hotel_name: 굿모닝 캄폿 게스트하우스 (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Beside the river Hotel”
content:
++location at the river and central
---Rooms don't have window and no ventilation.  No shoes allowed inside building.
Male staff is too rude

hotel_name: 굿모닝 캄폿 게스트하우스 (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Not great”
content: Floors were very dirty. Bad vibe overall. Would not book bus tickets at this guesthouse this was the most disappointing part of all.

hotel_name: 굿모닝 캄폿 게스트하우스 (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Good for a night”
content: These guys never smile, always try to give you too little change, and couldnt seem to care less about their guests. That said, no major problems (provided you count you change: it happened numerous times) and good location. Most rooms have no windows which makes this riverfront  location more quiet. You can find better

hotel_name: 굿모닝 캄폿 게스트하우스 (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: right opposite the river”
content: stayed in room for 1 night, no facilities ie refrigerator, safe box provided. not valur for the money. shower too slow. only good point is its location

hotel_name: 굿모닝 캄폿 게스트하우스 (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Uncomfortable to stay”
content:
Since first impression to the guesthouse nobody welcoming the guest while arrival, after we process the check in go to the room and the room was leaking of water from toilet or maybe someone just leave the room the important thing is u can not close the toilet door it was Stuck 
, when we ask to change the room the staff just like don't want to change for us, even we requested to upgrade us to another room. Nobody response,

hotel_name: 굿모닝 캄폿 게스트하우스 (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: This pla e is rather soso.”
content: Room reeked of smoke, which was actually about all that was in the room, other than a bed. Extremely basic.

hotel_name: 굿모닝 캄폿 게스트하우스 (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Good location”
content: Old style

hotel_name: 굿모닝 캄폿 게스트하우스 (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Very cheap room ”
content:
The bed was fairly good in defense of my review however I selected a room without A/C as I had done in other places but the room was actually hotter than outside somehow. 

The toilet didn't seem to get rid of whatever you flushed and the water was constantly yellow. 

The staff were extremely friendly to be fair so if you got a better room it may well be a much better experience.

hotel_name: 굿모닝 캄폿 게스트하우스 (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Its not bad, if you’re not paying too much.”
content: We stayed for a week. For the price we paid, $30/night, we were kind of expecting more (I.e. new sheets, towels toilet paper etc.). They did empty out trash because we left it outside of our room, but if we hadn’t I don’t know if it would have been emptied. We found out later that our rate was probably higher due to a local festival taking place during our stay. If you’re not paying, at most, more than $15 a night and are only staying for a couple nights this place isn’t bad. The ac and WiFi worked well and it was clean and quite, but still don’t expect much in terms of service.

hotel_name: 굿모닝 캄폿 게스트하우스 (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: The actual property is not same as the information in Agoda.com”
content: It looks like cheating.

hotel_name: 굿모닝 캄폿 게스트하우스 (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Clean bed in budget hotel. Bare necessities. ”
content:
Was put on 3rd floor and bar is on the 4th floor. Noisy at night Although they did turn off music just after 10pm. People still partying and shouting at top of voices until I went down to complain to front desk at 11pm. Avoid the 3rd floor! 
Underneath toilet seat had poop stains and toilet door warped so wouldn't close properly.

hotel_name: 굿모닝 캄폿 게스트하우스 (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Water not working ”
content: The pipes have a problem with warter and the bathroom was in a bad condition.

hotel_name: 굿모닝 캄폿 게스트하우스 (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Facilities at bad condition ”
content: Water not working well, everything facilities are old and some are broken.

hotel_name: 굿모닝 캄폿 게스트하우스 (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Sparse.”
content: Cheap but very very basic room. Water leaking in from roof.  Crappy shower. Grotty bathroom.

hotel_name: 굿모닝 캄폿 게스트하우스 (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Good location, but bad rooms”
content: Location is good, but rooms are without window and no ventilation. Staff is rude and overcharge for anything

hotel_name: 굿모닝 캄폿 게스트하우스 (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: The absolute basics nothing more”
content: Location is good. The windowless room was bare bone and when the electricity cut out which happened often remained pitch black. They insist no footwear any wear in the hotel. Guests leave shoes outside. Rooms just feel dead. No Color or homely touches. Prison must be similar.

hotel_name: 굿모닝 캄폿 게스트하우스 (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: It's ok for 1-2 nights”
content: Very basic room not even a chair in the room. It's ok for 1-2 nights. There are cheaper places with more comfortable rooms. They charge more for rooms with city view but the window only shows a building under construction.

hotel_name: 원더즈 캄폿 (Onederz Kampot)
title: 친절하고 저렴하다”
content: 이곳 조식은 단돈. 이달러 든든하다 나머지 음료나 모든것이 비싸지 않다 수여복 지창시 더 좋은경험 할 수 있음

hotel_name: 원더즈 캄폿 (Onederz Kampot)
title: 더럽다”
content: 모든 타월에서 시궁창 냄새가 난다. 복도 천장에서는 비가 올 때 물이 샌다. 스텝 중 키 작고 통통한 여자가 있는데 아주 불친절하다. 항상 똥씹은 표정이다.
